# Test: grove remove --force removes dirty and locked worktree
setup_workspace force-both

exec grove add force-both
cp $WORK/dirty.txt ../force-both/untracked.txt
exec git -C $WORK/workspace/.bare worktree lock ../force-both

exec grove remove --force force-both
stderr 'Removed worktree'
! exists ../force-both

-- dirty.txt --
dirty
